text: The 2017 Metropolitan FA season is the club's third season of existence. The club will play in the Puerto Rico Soccer League, the first tier of the Puerto Rico soccer pyramid. ==Transfers== ===In=== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; font-size:90%; " |- ! style="background:#F86103; color:white; width:100px;"| Date ! style="background:#F86103; color:white; width:50px;"| Position ! style="background:#F86103; color:white; width:50px;"| Nationality ! style="background:#F86103; color:white; width:150px;"| Name ! style="background:#F86103; color:white; width:150px;"| From ! style="background:#F86103; color:white; width:100px;"| Fee ! style="background:#F86103; color:white; width:35px;"| Ref. |- | || FW || || || || Undisclosed || |- |} ===Out=== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; font-size:90%; " |- ! style="background:#F86103; color:white; width:150px;"| Date ! style="background:#F86103; color:white; width:50px;"| Position ! style="background:#F86103; color:white; width:50px;"| Nationality ! style="background:#F86103; color:white; width:150px;"| Name ! style="background:#F86103; color:white; width:110px;"| To ! style="background:#F86103; color:white; width:100px;"| Fee ! style="background:#F86103; color:white; width:25px;"| Ref. |- | || |||| || || Undisclosed || |- |} == Competitions == ===Bayamon Cup=== The 2017 Metropolitan FA team announced the A team will be participating in the Bayamon City Cup. ====Matches==== ===Don Bosco Cup=== The 2017 Metropolitan FA team announced the B team will be participating in the Don Bosco Cup. ====Matches==== === PRSL === The 2017 PRSL regular season schedule has not been announced. === Copa Luis Villarejo === The 2017 Copa Luis Villarejo schedule has not been announced. == References ==
title: 2017 Metropolitan FA season
